home.title: I'm FullStack Developer
home.body: Hi! I'm Nadia Antonella Ruiz. I'm a final-year student in the University Technical Program in Programming at UTN. I've worked on projects using technologies like React, Express.js, MongoDB, and more. My focus is on creating solutions that are both functional and aesthetically pleasing.

about.title: About me
about.body: I'm passionate about technology and how it can have a positive impact on people's lives. For me, innovation is a way to transform society, emotions, and mindsets. I enjoy combining technical and soft skills because I believe that the balance between the two makes all the difference.
about.body2: I enjoy cooking and reading; these activities help me connect with myself and keep my mind creative. I also enjoy listening to music and practicing yoga three times a week.
about.body3: I consider myself naturally curious. I enjoy learning, exploring new ideas, and sharing what I know. I believe that personal and professional growth go hand in hand, and I try to live by that mindset.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.piaceresDesc: Informative website for a restaurant, featuring a dynamic contact form and a digital menu section under development.
portfolio.reedDesc: Website with a dynamic product catalog and user authentication. Built with connected frontend and backend, including signup, login, and token-based security.
portfolio.ruizDesc: Informative landing page for an accounting firm, developed using AI-powered tools.

experience.title: Experience
experience.body: These are the technologies I have worked with.

formation.title: Education
formation.subtitle: These are the learning experiences that helped me strengthen my technical skills and my focus on developing functional and scalable solutions.

bootcamp.title: AWS DevOps Bootcamp
bootcamp.description: Intensive bootcamp focused on cloud infrastructure, CI/CD, and automation using AWS. Successfully completed with official certification.

utn.title: University Degree in Programming
utn.description: Knowledge in programming languages and databases, including Python, C#, SQL, MySQL, MongoDB, JavaScript, and React. The program also covers programming fundamentals, technical English, and the history of computing.

courses.title: Full Stack Web Developer
courses.description: Projects focused on React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and design tools such as Figma and Photoshop.Projects focused on React, Node.js, Express and MongoDB, also using design tools (Figma, Adobe XD) and task management tools.

contact.title: Contact
contact.body: If you are interested in working with me. Write me!
